relevant_findings.distal_strength: Normal in the legs and feet
relevant_findings.reflexes: 2+ at the knees and trace at both ankles
relevant_findings.sensation: Graded reduction in pinprick and cold sensation in both feet, normalizing at mid-shins bilaterally
relevant_findings.vibration: Reduced to 2 to 3 seconds in the great toes but normal proximally

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Neuropathic symptoms have worsened over the years, with bilateral pain, numbness, and cramping in feet.
